metadata.title: CVE-2023-49085 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti provides an operational monitoring and fault management framework. Inversions 1.2.25 and prior, it is possible to execute arbitrary SQL codethrough the `pollers.php` script. An authorized user may be able to executearbitrary SQL code. The vulnerable component is the `pollers.php`. Impactof the vulnerability - arbitrary SQL code execution. As of time ofpublication, a patch does not appear to exist.

criterions.comment: cacti package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
